title: OpenAI launches Atlas web browser to compete with Google Chrome
description: OpenAI said Tuesday it is introducing its own web browser, Atlas, putting the ChatGPT maker in direct competition with Google as more internet users rely on artificial intelligence to answer their questions.

title: ChatGPT maker OpenAI hired 100 ex bankers from JPMorgan, Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley to train these new models
